data.title: Nucor company profile
data.meta_description: In 2023 the revenue of Nucor decreased by 16.4% from the previous year, after peaking in 2022. The company engages in the sector 'Manufacturing'.
data.text:
All companiesNucor

Nucor

Nucor was founded in 1958 and operates in Charlotte, United States. The company engages in the sector 'Manufacturing' (ISIC: C). It is defined as the physical or chemical transformation of materials of components into new products, whether the work is performed by power-driven machines or by hand, whether in a factory or a worker's home, and whether the products are sold wholesale or in retail. Included are assembly of component parts of manufactured products and recycling of waste materials.
